attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rheumatoid Arthritis is a non cureable decease and approximately 500,000 people suffer and have to take several forms of medicine to relieve the pain caused by RA.I feel that RA sufferers should be exempt prescription charges.On average RA sufferers have to take a DMARD,Folic acid and at least two pain killers.RA strikes all ages and even with annual subsciption payment the yearly cost is very expensive. Remember the charges are for most of peoples lives.

rejection.details:
There is already a petition on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/rheumprescrip
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
